head.title: The Talk; My Life in Pictures

hedline.hl1: The Talk; My Life in Pictures

block.p: 1964 That's the house in Connecticut. I look like my mom. My sister is much more blond.; 1970 Graduation day -- I went to P.S. 6 in New York. I've always had long hair. I just like it long. The one thing that I haven't really changed in my life.; 1985 That was when I was single, in the Hamptons with Tommy Cohen, renting houses with friends every weekend.I was working for Ralph Lauren during the week.; 1986 Calvin and I on our wedding day. I remember spending a day or two in Rome, and then we were off to buy fabric.; 1995 At the Council of Fashion Designers of America. I was wearing a Calvin dress. When he first did the bias slip dresses, I wore them all the time.; 2006 Tony Melillo and me at Art Basel Miami. We were shopping for clothing. The Raleigh Hotel has a little boutique, and we were taking a break from all the events.
